summary: Provides a Moto mock implementation of the Amazon Managed Service for Prometheus (AMP) API, including custom exceptions, in‑memory data models for workspaces and rule‑group namespaces, and request routing that translates HTTP calls into backend CRUD, logging, and tagging operations.
business_intent: Allows developers to test and develop applications that interact with AWS AMP locally without contacting the real service, ensuring functional correctness and faster test cycles.
